titles.title: Condemning New York Governor Kathy Hochul for reducing funding for schools across New York State and prioritizing increased funding for migrants.
Condemning New York Governor Kathy Hochul for reducing funding for schools across New York State and prioritizing increased funding for migrants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
This resolution denounces Governor Kathy Hochul for reducing funding for schools across the state of New York.
Additionally, the resolution condemns Governor Hochul for allowing the border crisis to displace students and harm their education.
The resolution also urges Governor Hochul to rescind her 2025 state budget proposal and prioritize students over migrants by reversing the funding cuts to schools.
